Tucson nods once to Big Convoy's suggestion. He then extends his hand in gr=
eeting to Mach Kick and Break.

" Noted Sir.  And it's good to meet both of=
 you.  Hmm, from what I have already observed, Magmatron is a highly establ=
ished strategist.  You're right, Big Convoy, getting past him will not be e=
asy.  Then again, my comrades often have a hard time trying to figure me ou=
t.  I admit that some of my techniques are completely out of the box but so=
 far, we've all survived through some very difficult times.  Which has now =
led me here, to you.  I know this happened for a very good reason, and if I=
 can get all of you out safely I will.  It's just going to have to be a lit=
tle creatively done, if you know what I mean..  And I already have somethin=
g in mind. "

He steps closer to all of them.  As he spoke his voice was ke=
pt at a whisper. He continues but lowers it even further to the point where=
 only his new found friends could hear.

" I noticed that as a Maximal, in =
beast form, I experienced strong urges to revert to my most primitive of an=
imal instincts.  Mind you, dragons can be extremely aggressive and destruct=
ive as well as wise.  I've also found my tail and wings to be rather strong=
.  But most of all, my voice. As the dragon, my roar has a sonic component =
to it.  This means that through proper harmonics I could stir up a sizable =
diversion, long enough to get you out of here.  Of course my little reversi=
on will be controlled and as soon as you're free, I will join you.  If I do=
n't make it out, at least I know that you will, and then you can rejoin Leo=
 Prime and the others back at the Ark where you belong. This is a risk I am=
 more than willing to take for your freedom.  So, all in favor, shake on it=
."

He keeps his hand extended to his new comrades.

Perpetually on the mov=
e and constantly busy.

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Tucson nods once to Big Convoy's sugge=
stion. He then extends his hand in greeting to Mach Kick and Break.</div><d=
iv><br></div><div>" Noted Sir.  And it's good to meet both of you. &nb=
sp;Hmm, from what I have already observed, Magmatron is a highly establishe=
d strategist.  You're right, Big Convoy, getting past him will not be =
easy.  Then again, my comrades often have a hard time trying to figure=

 box but so far, we've all survived through some very difficult times. &nbs=
p;Which has now led me here, to you.  I know this happened for a very =
good reason, and if I can get all of you out safely I will.  It's just=
 going to have to be a little creatively done, if you know what I mean.. &n=
bsp;And I already have something in mind. "</div><div><br></div><div>He ste=
ps closer to all of them.  As he spoke his voice was kept at a whisper=
. He continues but lowers it even further to the point where only his new f=
ound friends could hear.</div><div><br></div><div>" I noticed that as a Max=
imal, in beast form, I experienced strong urges to revert to my most primit=
ive of animal instincts.  Mind you, dragons can be extremely aggressiv=
e and destructive as well as wise.  I've also found my tail and wings =
to be rather strong.  But most of all, my voice. As the dragon, my roa=
r has a sonic component to it.  This means that through proper harmoni=
cs I could stir up a sizable diversion, long enough to get you out of here.=
  Of course my little reversion will be controlled and as soon as you'=
re free, I will join you.  If I don't make it out, at least I know tha=
t you will, and then you can rejoin Leo Prime and the others back at the Ar=
k where you belong. This is a risk I am more than willing to take for your =
freedom.  So, all in favor, shake on it."</div><div><br></div><div>He =
keeps his hand extended to his new comrades.</div><div><br>Perpetually on t=
he move and constantly busy. </div><div><br>On Sep 29, 2011, at 6:25 A=

      <p>BIG CONVOY 'bumped' into TUSCON as he wa=
s talking with his hands,<br>
disrupting the conversation. "Be careful here=
 boy." He said in low<br>
fierce tones. "Some of Magmatron's men used to be=
 Maximals, and there<br>
is no tellin' who has been trained in what."<br>
<=
br>
There was a resignation in BIG CONVOY's voice as he looked at TUSCON,<b=
r>
"You don't think we tried to escape?" He sighed, "We caught up to<br>
Ma=
gmatron on planet Gaia, but still lost, and ended up here."<br>
<br>
"Who i=
s this?" Says one of two other warriors ask as they walk up to<br>
BIG CONV=
OY and TUSCON, he was shorter than TUSCON and BIG CONVOY,<br>
perhaps as ta=
ll as CHEETOR.<br>
<br>
"Heh" The other one grunts, this one perhaps as tal=
l as Straight shot,<br>
but full of gusto. "He looks kinda' green.<br>
<br>=

The first shakes his head, "Anh, he looks kinda silver."<br>

There wa=
s a trace of a smile on BIG CONVOY, "Mach Kick, Break, meet Tuscon.<br>
